title: Mastering the Art of the Cover Letter in the AI Era
excerpt: Is the cover letter dead? Not quite. Learn how to write a personalized cover letter that complements your AI-built resume.
content:
While some say cover letters are obsolete, they still offer a unique opportunity to tell your story in a way a resume can't. Here's how to do it right...

Focus on the 'Why'

Your resume shows what you've done. Your cover letter should explain why you want this specific job and why you're a good fit for the company culture...
